channel.title: Poem on brereton.me
channel.description: Recent content in Poem on brereton.me

item.title: Ozymandius
item.description: Shifting drifts of sand Lazily etch their message In the old king’s plaque. Words that used to read “Upon my works, ye mighty Gaze and feel despair!” Despite my straining, All I sense is the endless Whisper of the sands.
